description: OpenTelemetry .Net (dotnet) ASP.NET using RED and USE method

targets.expr: max by (http_connection_state, server_address, server_port, url_scheme, network_protocol_version) (max_over_time(http_client_open_connections{service_name="$service_name", deployment_environment="$deployment_environment"}[$__interval]))

title: OpenTelemetry dotnet webapi
